VEC.Q: How many ridgelines are in this ridgeline chart?
VEC.A: There are {4} slices in this chart.

SRP.Q: What is the spatial relationship of the peak of Commodities relative to the peak of Venture Capital in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: The peak of  Commodities is to the {left} of the peak of Venture Capital.

VPR.Q: What distribution pattern does the ridgeline representing Angel Investments show?
VPR.A: The ridgeline representing Angel Investments shows a {Single Peak Distribution}.

EVJ.Q: Which ridgeline has the highest peak
EVJ.A: The ridgeline representing {Angel Investments} has the highest peak.

EVJ.Q: Which label has the highest density at X =-2.2?
EVJ.A: At X =-2.2,the label with the highest density is {Angel Investments}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 14? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 4? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Commodities}'s peak at {-6},{Angel Investments}'s peak at {-6},{Peer-to-Peer Lending}'s peak at {-4}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Peer-to-Peer Lending or Commodities?
NC.A: {Peer-to-Peer Lending} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Commodities or Angel Investments?
NC.A: {Commodities} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Angel Investments or Venture Capital?
NC.A: {Venture Capital} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {1} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Angel Investments}
